item.title: Useful Aliases for Bash
item.description: Just a bunch of useful aliases. alias observe="tail -f -n 62" alias gpp='git pull --rebase --autostash && git push' alias gci='git commit -v --interactive' alias gsv='git status --verbose' alias gl='git log -v' alias gg='git log --graph --oneline --all' alias gd='git diff'
